solution_line_template: During one minute the metro sells {tickets_per_minute} tickets, so they earn {tickets_per_minute} * {cost_per_ticket} = $<<{tickets_per_minute}*{cost_per_ticket}={earnings_per_minute}>>{earnings_per_minute}.
So in {total_minutes} minutes they would earn {earnings_per_minute} * {total_minutes} = $<<{earnings_per_minute}*{total_minutes}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
